content: That was really well written, to the point and with an empathy from your side as well. You seem to care that other people should care ;) To what degree do you think empathy can be learned? Unfortunately, some leaders don’t have it in spades. But they might be willing to learn. I know that you can do your daily loving kindness meditation. I know that it works, but even if you focus on that for a looong time, changing personality traits is hard. And most managers are not even close to taking up such a practice. Are they doomed? Do you know of any more hands on a businessy practises?
